system:
note description: "[ Displays a list of multi item rows from which the user can select.
Note: The list start at the index 1, the titles are not count among the rows. The columns start also at the index 1. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "list, multi, column, row, table" date: "$Date: 2017-05-03 08:56:14 -0700 (Wed, 03 May 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100317 $"
